resources.string: Here would be displayed lyrics of the chosen song.\nThey would be downloaded from internet.
Here would be displayed text about history of the song and some history about it\'s authors. All downloaded from internet.

This TextView would be changed to ImageView and would display album cover of currently playing song. This activity would be the first to be displayed when application starts. On the bottom would be displayed song and band name using setText. Through like and dislike button user would be able to make songs appear more or less often in future added randomLayout.
Possible view of this layout. ImageView would allow to play a song in the same line. Automatically names at the bottom would change. The songs would be displayed using ListView and ArrayAdapter.
